sentences.sentence: At one time we could transfigure into any shape including any animal form.
sentences.translation: 在某个时候，我们能变身成任何外形，包括任何动物形体。

sentences.sentence: Speak the prose only once per day and intend to transfigure the dream according to the intention.
sentences.translation: 我建议你们，每天只读一次散文诗，然后就可以意愿梦想根据意愿来改变了。

sentences.sentence: But what does it transfigure when it presents the world of appearance in the image of the suffering hero?
sentences.translation: 然而，如果它以受难的英雄形象来表现现象界，它到底美化了甚么呢？
